author: maxb
msg: Fix issue 2182. If an error occurs reading an AuthzSVNAccessFile, then say so
Do not silently ignore unreadable files.
Display a more informative error message.

author: lundblad
msg: Last part of the notify API redesign.  Make the cmdline client use the new
(notify): Change signature to new notify func type.  Used pool passed
by caller instead of pool of baton.  Rewrite everything to use the notify
(svn_cl__get_notifier): Change to new notify func.  Don't create a pool

author: lundblad
msg: Second part of the notification API redesign.  Change everything in
libsvn_client to use the new APIs.
(merge_delete_notify_baton_t): Change field to new notify funct type.
(merge_delete_notify_func): Use new notify func signature.  Remove redundant
cast.  Dup the notify struct if we need to change it.
(svn_client_delete): Pass new notify func to svn_client__wc_delete.
deprecated API.  Reorganize notification part a bit.
deprecated API.  Change notify_func argument to new type; callers updated.
(add_directory, close_file, svn_client_export3): Don't use deprecated API.
(svn_client__get_diff_editor): Change notify_func argument to new type.

author: epg
msg: Restore votes for r13222, r13223, and r13232, note its dependency on
r13193, and specify a branch to use for the merge.

author: epg
msg: Merge trunk r13222, r13223, and r13232 for backport.
